environments.name: APP-IAM
APP-VPC-Blueprint

attributes.output: {"vpc_cidr":{"value":"${var.vpc_cidr_block}"},"vpc_id":{"value":"${ aws_vpc.application_vpc.id }"},"igw_id":{"value":"${ aws_internet_gateway.igw.id }"},"log_group_arn":{"value":"${ aws_cloudwatch_log_group.log_group.arn }"},"az1":{"value":"${var.az1}"},"az2":{"value":"${var.az2}"},"vpc_flow_log_id":{"value":"${ aws_flow_log.flow_log.id }"},"public_igw_rt":{"value":"${ aws_route_table.pub_rt.id }"},"private_to_nat_gateway_a":{"value":"${ aws_route_table.private_to_nat_gateway_a.id }"},"private_to_nat_gateway_b":{"value":"${ aws_route_table.private_to_nat_gateway_b.id }"},"nacl_id":{"value":"${ aws_network_acl.guardrail_nacl.id }"},"xelb_subnet_a":{"value":"${ aws_subnet.xelb_subnet_a.id }"},"xelb_subnet_b":{"value":"${ aws_subnet.xelb_subnet_b.id }"},"web_subnet_a":{"value":"${ aws_subnet.web_subnet_a.id }"},"web_subnet_b":{"value":"${ aws_subnet.web_subnet_b.id }"},"db_subnet_a":{"value":"${ aws_subnet.db_subnet_a.id }"},"db_subnet_b":{"value":"${ aws_subnet.db_subnet_b.id }"},"ielb_subnet_a":{"value":"${ aws_subnet.ielb_subnet_a.id  }"},"ielb_subnet_b":{"value":"${ aws_subnet.ielb_subnet_b.id }"},"app_subnet_a":{"value":"${ aws_subnet.app_subnet_a.id }"},"app_subnet_b":{"value":"${ aws_subnet.app_subnet_b.id }"},"natgateway_id_a":{"value":"${ aws_nat_gateway.nat_gateway_a.id }"},"natgateway_id_b":{"value":"${ aws_nat_gateway.nat_gateway_b.id }"}}

environments.description: Audit blueprint to create cloudwatch alarms
environments.name: Audit-Blueprint

attributes.name: ${var.product_name}-${var.environment}-securitygroup_changes_metric_filter
attributes.pattern: {($.eventName = AuthorizeSecurityGroupIngress) || ($.eventName = AuthorizeSecurityGroupEgress) || ($.eventName = RevokeSecurityGroupIngress) || ($.eventName = RevokeSecurityGroupEgress) || ($.eventName = CreateSecurityGroup) || ($.eventName = DeleteSecurityGroup)}

attributes.alarm_description: Alarms when an API call is made to create, update or delete a Security Group
Alarms when an API call is made to create, update or delete a CloudTrail trail, or to start or stop logging to a trail
Alarms when an API call is made to create, terminate, start, stop or reboot an EC2 instance

attributes.pattern: {($.eventName = CreateVpc) || ($.eventName = DeleteVpc) || ($.eventName = ModifyVpcAttribute) || ($.eventName = AcceptVpcPeeringConnection) || ($.eventName = CreateVpcPeeringConnection) || ($.eventName = DeleteVpcPeeringConnection) || ($.eventName = RejectVpcPeeringConnection) || ($.eventName = AttachClassicLinkVpc) || ($.eventName = DetachClassicLinkVpc) || ($.eventName = DisableVpcClassicLink) || ($.eventName = EnableVpcClassicLink)}
attributes.name: ${var.product_name}-${var.environment}-vpc_changes_metric_filter

attributes.alarm_description: Alarms when an API call is made to create, update or delete a VPC, VPC peering connection or VPC connection to classic

attributes.name: ${var.product_name}-${var.environment}-gateway_changes_metric_filter
attributes.pattern: {($.eventName = CreateCustomerGateway) || ($.eventName = DeleteCustomerGateway) || ($.eventName = AttachInternetGateway) || ($.eventName = CreateInternetGateway) || ($.eventName = DeleteInternetGateway) || ($.eventName = DetachInternetGateway)}

attributes.alarm_description: Alarms when an API call is made to create, terminate, start, stop or reboot a 4x or 8x-large EC2 instance

attributes.name: ${var.product_name}-${var.environment}-networkacl_changes_metric_filter
attributes.pattern: {($.eventName = CreateNetworkAcl) || ($.eventName = CreateNetworkAclEntry) || ($.eventName = DeleteNetworkAcl) || ($.eventName = DeleteNetworkAclEntry) || ($.eventName = ReplaceNetworkAclEntry) || ($.eventName = ReplaceNetworkAclAssociation)}

attributes.alarm_description: Alarms when an unauthorized API call is made
Alarms when an API call is made to create, update or delete a Network ACL
Alarms when an unauthenticated API call is made to sign into the console
Alarms when an API call is made to create, update or delete a Customer or Internet Gateway
Alarms when an API call is made to change an IAM policy
